description: It's the latest in a long history of vandalism from decapitation to political slogans.
title: Hong Kong protests: Copenhagen's Little Mermaid statue graffitied
title_page: Hong Kong protests: Copenhagen's Little Mermaid statue graffitied - BBC News
maintext: Since then, one arm and the (replaced) head again have suffered the same fate while an explosion once knocked her off her rock into the water.
